del Pozo, F

Díaz, C
metadata.dc:description: Five cases of choledochal cyst diagnosed from 1976 to 1983 are presented. Four patients began in the neonatal period as a cholestatic syndrome resembling biliary atresia and one patient began later on as a cholangitis. It is important for diagnosis the use of ultrasounds and radionuclide hepatobiliary. Clinical course depends on early diagnosis and treatment, because there is often an atresia of the common hepatic duct associated.
metadata.dc:title: Quiste de colédoco. Presentación de cinco casos en la infancia.
[Choledochal cyst. Presentation of 5 cases in childhood].
